item.description: 1. Upload bootstrap files to the newly created VPS: scp * root@IP_ADDRESS: Log into the VPS chmod +x vps2arch mv * / && cd / .

item.title: Installing Arch Linux in VirtualBox
Installing Arch Linux on a PC
item.description: This guide explains how to install vanilla Arch Linux on a PC. Prerequisites A PC or a laptop, with a USB port wifi adapter a HDD with contents that are no longer needed A USB stick with contents that are no longer needed. A PC with a working operating system and internet access.
